choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Sure, here's a sample email you can use:
Subject: Notification of Departure
Dear [Boss's Name],
I hope this email finds you well. After careful consideration, I have decided to resign from my position as [Your Position] at [Company Name]. My last day will be [Last Day].
I would like to take this opportunity to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I have gained while working with your team. It has been a pleasure to work alongside such talented and dedicated individuals, and I will always cherish the memories we have created together.
Please do not hesitate to reach out if there is anything I can assist you with before my departure. I wish you all the best in your future endeavors.
Thank you for your understanding and support during this transition period.
Best regards,
[Your Name]
